course_description: The director for this course is Robert S. Kistenberg, MPH, CP. This course is designed to prepare the health care student with foundational knowledge of lower limb prosthetics in order to be able to engage with people who require prosthetic rehabilitation, prosthetists, and other health care team members in an informed manner.
sections: Class Nbr: 1842, Section #: 000, Type: LEC, Campus: ATL, Meets: Does Not Meet, Instructor: Phillips/Johanson, Status: Open
